code: import{formatEther}from'ethers';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NFTCard=_ref=>{let{nft,contract,account,onBuy}=_ref;const handleBuy=async()=>{try{const tx=await contract.buyNFT(nft.id,{value:formatEther(nft.price.toString())});await tx.wait();onBuy();}catch(error){console.error("Error buying NFT:",error);alert("Error buying NFT: "+error.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nft-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nft-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`https://ipfs.io/ipfs/${nft.imageHash}`,alt:`NFT ${nft.id}`,onError:e=>{e.target.src='https://via.placeholder.com/300';}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nft-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["NFT #",nft.id]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"price",children:[formatEther(nft.price)," ETH"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"owner",children:["Owner: ",`${nft.owner.slice(0,6)}...${nft.owner.slice(-4)}`]}),account&&account.toLowerCase()!==nft.owner.toLowerCase()&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"buy-btn",onClick:handleBuy,children:"Buy Now"})]})]});};export default NFTCard;
